titles.title: Mäṣḥafä gǝnzät “Book of the Funeral Ritual” / Excerpts from Mängädä sämay "Journey to Heaven", biblical readings

shortcontents.shortcontent:
I) Mäṣḥafä gǝnzät “Book of the Funeral Ritual” (fols. 1ra-162ra) II) Excerpts from Mängädä sämay "Journey to Heaven", biblical readings (fols. 162ra-163vb), incomplete
Additio 1.

originlink.xlink:title: Däbrä Sahәl Qәddus Mikaʾel Bet Mäḵaʿ / DSM

locationlink.xlink:title: Däbrä Sahәl Qәddus Mikaʾel Bet Mäḵaʿ / DSM

donors.donor: The name of Sǝbuḥ ʾAmlak is written in the main hand in red ink in the supplication formulas, e.g., on fols. 16va, 18rb, 37rb, 160va. The names of several individuals, among whom Wäldä Maryam and ʾAmätä Maryam, are written interlineally in a secondary hand in strong fuchsia ink(s. Varia).

txstates.txstate: The Ms. shows traces of extensive use. The spine cover is missing, probably cut off to facilitate resewing; remains of glues are preserved on the inner side of both boards. The Ms. was resewn with a modern thread. Many leaves are severely stained with humidity, wax and dirt, esp. at the beginning and at the end of the Ms. (e.g., fols. 7r, 10r, 12v, 19r, 139v, 146r, 149v). Text in red ink is barely legible on some leaves: e.g., fols. 4ra, 9vb, 11ra. Fol. 38 is undersized. Tears amended on many leaves: e.g., fols. 61, 89, 103, 107.

bindings.binding: Two wooden boards. Two pairs of sewing stations.

bnothers.bnother: Small holes are visible on the spine fold of the quires, close to the head and to the tail of the codex.

txfolios.txfolio: Foliation mistake: number 60 is used twice; the second fol. has been given number 60a.

squires.squire:
I(10/fols. 1r-10v) – II(10/fols. 11r-20v) – ፫III(10/fols. 21r-30v) - ፬IV(10; s.l.: 3, stub after 7; 8, stub after 2/fols. 31r-40v) – ፭V(10; s.l.: 3, stub after 8; 8, stub after 3/fols. 41r-50v) – ፮VI(10/fols. 51r-60v) – ፯VII(10/fols. 60ar-69v) – ፰VIII(10/fols. 70r-79v) – ፱IX(10; s.l.: 3, stub after 8; 8, stub after 3/fols. 80r-89v) - ፲X(10/fols. 90r-99v) – ፲፩XI(10/fols. 100r-109v) – ፲፪XII(10; s.l.: 3, stub after 7; 8, stub after 2/fols. 110r-119v) – ፲፫XIII(8; s.l.: 3, stub after 5; 6, stub after 2/fols. 120r-127v) – ፲፬XIV(10/fols. 128r-137v) – ፲፭XV(8; s.l.: 2, stub after 5; 4, stub after 4; 6, stub after 1; 7, stub after 1/fols. 138r-145v) – ፲፮XVI(10/fols. 146r-155v) – XVII(8/fols. 156r-163v) – B(3; s.l.: 3, stub before 1/fols. 164r-166v).
The structure of quire XV cannot be established with certainty.

taunit.rl-info:
Ruling and pricking are visible. Ruling pattern: 1A-1A-1A1A/0-0/0-0/C. Primary pricks are visible. Ruling pricks are visible. The upper line is written above the ruling. The bottom line is written above the ruling.
Fols. 156r-v have two additional bottom ruled lines not used by the scribe. Fol. 164v has one additional ruled line not used by the scribe.

phandwritings.phandwriting: Hand a: fine; hand b: mediocre.

pchangeofhands.pchangeofhand: Hand a: fols. 1ra-162ra; Hand b: fols. 162ra-163vb, characterized by right-sloping letters.

rubrications.rubrication: Nomina sacra, name of the donor; several groups of lines on the incipit page of Text I, alternating with black lines; incipit of each section of Text I; names of the Hebrew letters in Ps. 118 (e.g., fols. 30vb, 31ra); some other words or their abbreviations, such as: halle luya (e.g., fols. 1va, 35ra, 55va), yǝbälu ḥǝzb (e.g., fols. 6vb, 11vb), yǝbe kahǝn (e.g., fols. 25rb, 56rb, 124vb), fǝtuḥa (e.g., fols. 14rb, 16ra), wä-kaʿǝbä (e.g., fols. 26ra, 78rb, 81va), bǝṣuʿ (e.g., fol. 26va), wä-ʾǝmzǝ (e.g., fols. 34va, 46vb, 70rb), yäʾakkwǝtu (e.g., fols. 37vb, 38rb), gǝbrä ḥawaryat (e.g., fols. 42ra, 60ara, 132rb), dǝḫrä wängel (e.g., fols. 43va, 49va, 65ra), wä-tǝbǝl (e.g., fols. 120va, 127va), etc.; elements of the punctuation signs; elements of Ethiopic numerals.

abbreviations.abbreviation: ፍ፡ for ፍቱሐ፡ (e.g., fols. 14rb, 16rb) ይ፡ ዲ(ያ)፡ for ይቤ፡ ዲያቆን፡ (e.g., fols. 25rb, 42vb, 56rb, 76va, 129vb) ይ፡ ካ፡ for ይቤ፡ ካህን፡ (e.g., fols. 26vb, 45vb, 51va, 77ra, 143ra) (ይ፡) ሕ for ይቤ፡ ሕዝብ፡ (e.g., fols. 80va, 142va, 145ra) ብ፡ for ብጹዕ፡ (fol. 26vb) ን፡ እ፡ ወ፡ for ንስእለከ፡ እግዚኦ፡ ወናስተበቍዓከ፡ (e.g., fols. 35vb, 36va) ይትአ፡/ወይ፡ ስ፡ ለእ፡ for ይትአኰት፡ ወይሴባሕ፡ ስብሐተ፡ ለእግዚአብሔር፡ (fol. 37rb) ይ፡ ወ፡ ስ፡ ለ፡ for ይትአኰት፡ ወይሴባሕ፡ ስብሐተ፡ ለእግዚአብሔር፡ (fol. 37va) ይአ፡/ይአኰ፡ for ይአኰቱከ፡ (e.g., fols. 37vb, 38rb) ሃ፡ for ሃሌ፡ ሉያ፡ (e.g., fols. 40vb, 55va, 62rb, 127va, 133vb, 134va, 138ra) ትብ፡ for ትብል፡ (e.g., fols. 40vb, 41ra) ወ፡/ወት፡/ወትብ፡ for ወትብል፡ (e.g., fols. 46va, 55rb, 59va, 77ra, 136ra) ቡ፡/ቡራ፡ for ቡራኬ፡ (e.g., fols. 149vb, 152ra).

otherdetails.otherdetail: Text II was written later by hand b as a continuation of Text I. The text is incomplete.

additional.cont: Fols. 164va-165rb: Prayer of the Blessing of the Women.
additional.det: The note is written in a mediocre hand, characterized by thick letters. The title of the prayer is also written in blue pen in the upper margin of fol. 164v. Nomina sacra, two lines on the incipit page, the word ʾǝgäli and elements of the punctuation signs are rubricated.

extras.extra: - Tämälläs-sign, in the shape of two perpendicular lines (┴), indicating the place where the omission, written in the upper margin, belongs: fol. 13ra. - Omitted word inserted interlineally: fol. 13ra. - Erasures: e.g., fols. 51vb, 60ara, 67ra, 74ra, 90vb, 107vb. - Corrections written over erasures in the main hand: e.g., fols. 48ra, 92va, 110ra, 132vb. - Immediate corrections indicated by dashes above and below the letters: fol. 79rb. - Lacunae (spaces for rubrication left unfilled): fol. 156ra. - Cues for the rubricator written in the margin: fol. 108ra. - Scribbles in blue pen or in pencil: e.g., fols. 49r, 60v, 68v, 72v. - Several names are written interlineally in a secondary hand in strong fuchsia ink: Wäldä Maryam (e.g., fols. 17va, 41vb, 88vb, 97va, 111va, 129rb, 154rb), ʾAmätä Maryam (e.g., fols. 15va, 89rb, 95ra, 116rb, 138vb, 160va), Gäbrä Yoḥannǝs (e.g., fols. 44ra, 101rb, 142vb, 162va), Täklä ʾƎgziʾ (e.g., fols. 50ra, 103rb, 124ra, 149ra), Wälättä Täklä Haymanot (e.g., fols. 79ra, 81ra), Wälättä Maryam (fols. 81rb, 81va).

txquiremarks.txquiremark: - Undecorated quire marks are written in the left upper margin of fols. 21r: ፫, 31r: ፬, 41r: ፭, 51r: ፮, 60ar: ፯, 70r: ፰, 80r: ፱, 90r: ፲, 100r: ፲፩, 110r: ፲፪, 120r: ፲፫, 128r: ፲፬, 138r: ፲፭, 146r: ፲፮.

txfindingaids.txfindingaid: - Readings are indicated by the names of the days, crudely written in a secondary hand in blue pen in the upper margin: ዘመግነዝ፡ ዘይትበሀል፡ fol. 8v በግ(ን)ዘት፡ ይትነበብ፡ fol. 24ra ዘሰንበት፡ fol. 54v (in pencil) ዘይት፡ በ፯ዕለት፡ fol. 127v ዘ፴ በ፴ዕለት፡ ዘይትነበብ፡ fol. 133v ዘይት(ነ)በብ፡ በ፵ዕለ(ት)፡ fol. 137v - Directives for the ministers are crudely written in a secondary hand in blue pen in the upper margin: ፀሎተ፡ ንስሐ፡ fol. 79vb ዘካህናት፡ fol. 108ra ዘካህናት፡ ህብስተ፡ ህይወት፡ fol. 136r (also in the intercolumn) እግዚአ፡ ሕያዋን፡ ዘካህናት፡ fol. 142ra ጸሎተ፡ ንስሐ፡ fol. 145r ጸሎተ፡ ቡራኬ፡ ዘአበው፡ fol. 148vb ለዘቲ፡ ቤተክር(ስቲያን፡) fol. 152rb ጸሎተ፡ ቡራኬ፡ fol. 152vb ጸሎተ፡ ቡራኬ፡ ዘአንስት፡ fol. 164v. - Coloured threads have been inserted in the upper corner of fols. 107 and 120.
